Winner of over 23 awards, "Robot Stories" is science fiction from the heart,
four stories in which utterly human characters struggle to connect in a world
of robot babies and android office workers. The stories include: "My Robot
Baby," in which a couple must care for a robot baby before adopting a human
child; "The Robot Fixer," in which a mother tries to connect with her dying
son by completing his toy robot collection; "Machine Love," in which an office
worker android learns that he, too, needs love; and "Clay," in which an old
sculptor must choose between natural death and digital immortality.
